name: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
name_original: Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex
description:
Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex is an action game. It came out on 04-03-2004. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex on PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Takayasu Yanagihara and Takuya Iwasaki. Yōichi Take and Yuji Shimomura directed the game. Nobuyoshi Sano scored the game.
